## Map
The following map is an arbitrary list of 3-star Michelin Restaurants in the US.

```{r}
library(leaflet)

base_map <- 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lat = c(36.169090, 40.761421, 40.768429, 
            40.756179, 38.404435, 37.798330),
    lng = c(-115.140580, -73.981667, -73.983070, 
            -73.996358, -122.364795, -122.435984),
    popup = c('JoÃ«l Robuchon', 'Le Bernardin', 'Masa',
              'Chef\'s Table at Brooklyn Fare', 'The French Laundry', 
              'Atelier Crenn')
  )

base_map
```
